mapper.select: SELECT pr.id, pr.name, pr.price, pr.productImage FROM qsx_product pr WHERE pr.isHot = 1 LIMIT 5
SELECT pr.id, pr.name, pr.price, pr.productImage FROM qsx_product pr WHERE pr.isNew = 1 LIMIT 5
SELECT pr.id, pr.name, pr.price, pr.productImage FROM qsx_product pr WHERE pr.isBest = 1 LIMIT 5

SELECT pr.id, pr.name, pr.productImage, pr.marketPrice, pr.productType_id AS 'productType.id', (SELECT COUNT(ev.id) FROM qsx_evaluate ev WHERE ev.product_id = pr.id) AS 'evaluateCount' FROM qsx_product pr WHERE pr.productCategory_id = #{categoryId}
SELECT pr.id, pr.name, pr.productImage, pr.price FROM qsx_product pr WHERE pr.price = #{price}
SELECT pr.id, pr.name, pr.marketPrice, pr.price, pr.screenshots, pr.productImage, pr.description FROM qsx_product pr WHERE pr.id = #{productId}
